{{Infobox Berry |name = #01 Cheri |image = [[File:Cheri.png]] |caption = This bright red Berry is very spicy and has a provocative flavor. It blooms with delicate, pretty flowers. |growtime = 30s |harvest = 2 berries |replant = 50% |points = 5 |flavor =
*10 spicy *0 dry *0 sweet *0 bitter *0 sour }} '''Cheri''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]] to obtain [[Farming Points|Farm Points]]. It can be obtained as a random drop by defeating wild Pokémon on routes. {| class="wikitable" |+ Growth Stage Durations ! Seed !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !!
